message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, just as it has been to me.  I'm willing to part with it for $1,500,000.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but that price is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only justify spending  $700,000.  Would you be open to that?
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is substantial. I could meet you halfway at $1,100,000.  This is my final offer.
